text: tavada “apa veta pæmiṇi apagē deviyangē sādhakayan api viśvāsa kaḷā misa, vena kisima væræddak oba apa vetin dakinnehida?”yi (pavasā), “apagē deviyanē!apa kerehi ivasīma pahaḷa karanu mænava!(obaṭa) sampūrṇayenma avanata vūvan vaśayen (apava pat kara), apava oba atpat kara ganu mænava!” (yayida prārthanā kaḷaha)
